headline: Live Nation and Crew Nation Global Relief Fund Commit $1M to Support Los Angeles Music Community Impacted by Wildfires
summary: The Crew Nation Global Relief Fund is committing $1 million to assist performing musicians, live music crew, and live music industry workers affected by the recent wildfires in Los Angeles. Established by Live Nation Entertainment in 2020, Crew Nation has been dedicated to delivering aid to those in the music community experiencing unforeseen hardships.
